code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Container,Typography,Card,CardContent,CardMedia,Grid,Button}from'@mui/material';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DonationMarketplace=()=>{const[donations,setDonations]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const fetchDonations=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('/api/donations');setDonations(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching donations',error);}};fetchDonations();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{style:{marginTop:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",component:"h1",gutterBottom:true,children:"Donation Marketplace"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{container:true,spacing:3,children:donations.map(donation=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,sm:6,md:4,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{style:{height:'100%',display:'flex',flexDirection:'column'},children:[donation.images.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardMedia,{component:"img",height:"180",image:donation.images[0],alt:donation.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContent,{style:{flexGrow:1},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{gutterBottom:true,variant:"h5",children:donation.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"body2",color:"textSecondary",children:[donation.description.substring(0,100),"..."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"body2",color:"textSecondary",style:{marginTop:'10px'},children:["Donator: ",donation.donator.name]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",onClick:()=>navigate(`/donation/${donation.id}`),style:{margin:'10px'},children:"View Details"})]})},donation.id))})]});};export default DonationMarketplace;
